name: 15min Max
description:
Come play with Max! He's just a nice guy involuntarily stuck in a game world and needs your help.

15 min Max is the ultime game to prove your actual gaming talent. No time to practice. No endless hours of griding to get the highest score. And most importantly, no friends who spend way more time than you.

You have 15 minutes. So stop reading and start playing!

*We still plan to develop 15min Max further (and release it for mobiles). So any feedback is much appreciated, and rewarded with virtual kisses*

Please follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/DuckBridge
And Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/duckbridgegames
